frontmatter.author: Žan Mervič
frontmatter.title: Scoring Sheets: Transform Data into Insightful Scores
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: Orange's Scoring Sheet widget provides explainable machine learning predictions using a simple scoring system. Each feature's influence obtains an integer score, making it easier to understand and communicate the model, crucial in sectors where transparency is vital.
